Package ut.twente.notebridge.model

Class Message

java.lang.Object
ut.twente.notebridge.model.BaseEntity
ut.twente.notebridge.model.Message
public class Message extends BaseEntity
This class represents a message in the application. This class is used to store the messages sent by users in the messenger section
